titleStmt.title: Pantalogia. The saints abundance opened. / By Thomas Sterry preacher of the gospel. Published at the earnest intreaty of some friends. Imprimatur John Downame.
titleStmt.author: Sterry, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F: Neile for William Wenborn, at the signe of the Rose at the Bridge-foot.,

notesStmt.note: The first word of the title is printed in Greek characters.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
